page.title: 18Blue Doors Farm
page.content: Blue Doors farmhouse stands close to the A143 Haverhill to Bury St.Edmunds road and belongs to Mr. John Deeks.The house is a listed building,exact date unknown. Mr.Deekshas lived here for twenty-five years and his family hsave always been farmers.He and his son Robert work ninety acres,sown at the moment with wheat and oil-seed rape. The farm is very close to Highpoint Prison-the former R.A.F.Stradishall- and Mr.Deeks has made many friends among the officers."R.A.F.personnel move around from place to place,but prison officers are more permanent,so you can get to know them." Mr.Deeks is a familiar figure at local summer fetes in his bright yellow cart,pulled by a pony.
